title: Mechanics of Rammus
body: I recently achieved lvl7 on Rammus. I was wondering how do you cs with rammus at top lane? Becuase I only jungle with him. Are there any hard out Rammus players who could help me out? Im at wood teir atm. So any help would be appreciated.

replies.body:
Do you need to use mechanics to play rammus ? huehuehue

Nah, im sure you can get into practice tool and just try flashy plays and see if you can make some cool outplays with rammus's kit!
Thornmail + sf cape + rank 5 w = proxy rammus ðŸ¤”
